alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 14 at 7:45PM CST until December 19 at 10:21PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Hale, Greene and Marengo Counties. .Heavy rainfall across the basin is expected to produce minor flooding on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect at Selden. Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to late Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. At 94.0 feet, Between 94 and 97 feet, some secondary roads near Lock 5 park and Sandpiper Road begin to flood and could cut off residents. Some roads leading into Roebuck Landing are flooded between 96 and 97 feet. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 80.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 93.9 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
